parameters.name: BackupPlanId
parameters.description: The ID of the backup plan. To query multiple backup plans, separate the IDs with commas (,).

parameters.name: BackupPlanName
parameters.description: The name of the backup plan.

parameters.name: BackupPlanStatus
parameters.description:
The status of the backup plan. Valid values:

- **wait**: The backup plan is not configured.

- **init**: The backup plan failed to be started because the precheck failed.

- **running**: The backup plan is running.

- **stop**: The backup plan failed.

- **pause**: The backup plan is paused.

- **locked**: The backup plan is locked.

- **check\_pass**: The precheck passed.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: A client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request.

parameters.name: PageNum
parameters.description: The page number to return. The value must be an integer that is greater than or equal to 0. Default value: 0.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values: 1 to 100.

> Default value: **30**.

parameters.name: Region
parameters.description: The region ID of the DBS instance. To view the supported regions, call the [DescribeRegions](~~2869853~~) operation.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.
